JOB DESCRIPTION: Software Engineer II   Analyze fraud risks and client applications, conduct technical feasibility and determine product fitment    Configure business rules to automate issue detection and perform testing  Support in design and implementation of enhancements  Assist in developing proof of concepts  Deploy web applications and client software    Support User Acceptance Testing and production deployment  Maintain and support applications deployed in production  Conduct product demonstrations, support pre-sales and participate in reviews  Work estimation and planning  Ensure outstanding performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications  Identify bottlenecks and bugs, devise solutions to mitigate and address the issues  Prepare technical documentation and reports  Collaborate with internal team and external stakeholders throughout the project s lifecycle  Participate and encourage knowledge sharing  Help in defining and implementation of processes
